trends: There have been 45 other sightings in Grand Rapids
There were no other sightings in Grand Rapids on or around June 19th 2012
divs: sighting detailsi sat outside on my front porch to have a cigarette around 1 am and soon noticed an object appear from behind the trees and home across the street. i quickly stood up to examine it, as it's flight pattern\characteristics were mechanical-like. it was traveling diagonally away from the home, so i observed the rear of the craft. it seemed to wobble and teeter a bit and traveled slowly above the powerlines and trees. it had two round propellers on either side of its rear. i watched it continue on a straight course, till it was no longer in my range. it was approximately 3 feet wide and had a dark coloring. the "propellers" had a lighter color...more of a yellow\gold. it travelled around 15mph. the "wobbling" flight was most unusual and i made sure to observe it carefully to confirm it wasn't bird of some sort.
Summary: Small dark craft, appeared to slightly wobble...two round things on back propelled it slowly. No sound or lights. Low flying.
